Articles.Content:
Hello all!

I started playing after 1.1.3 was already out (and I hardly play anything else now). With the 1.2 build going official soon, I was wondering how often we should expect to see updates like this?

Welcome to the most addictive and rewarding game ever!

It's hard to say for sure because there isn't a set patch release schedule, but since I joined in early release, 0.21 or so, most major game-changing patches came about 6 to 12 months apart. There are sometimes some bug-fix patches inbetween, too.

Yeah a good rule of thumb is the bigger the update the longer the wait. Like astaroids

P.S. Welcome to the forums! Happy launches

2 hours ago, NAeX said:

Hello all!

I started playing after 1.1.3 was already out (and I hardly play anything else now). With the 1.2 build going official soon, I was wondering how often we should expect to see updates like this?

Welcome to the addiction! Play some, Check out the forums. You'll find out.
